articles.author: David Struett
articles.title: WXRT host Lin Brehmer dies at 68 - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: Lin Brehmer worked at WXRT for more than three decades. He loved the Cubs, the music, theater and food scenes and touched many Chicagoans, though they never met him.
articles.content:
Lin Brehmer often ended his radio essay segment Lins Bin by saying, Take nothing for granted. Its great to be alive.
